attributes.action: Formally recognise the town of Wootton Bassett by the award of the MBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recognition of the town's unequalled compassion and unprecedented and repeated marks of respect to the fallen, Wootton Bassett and all those who live there should be recognised forever.

Very rarely do the words of a citation of an award fit more appropriately :

"MBE - Awarded for: achievement or service in and to the community of a responsible kind which is outstanding in its field or very local 'hands-on' service which stands out as an example to others"

Thankyou

rejection.details:
The MBE is an award usually reserved for individuals. Please visit http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours for more details on how to nominate for an award. 

You may also be interested in a petition that already exists calling for the town to be formally recognised: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/makeitroyal/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
